API¶

inference.nested_model(adata[, deg_corr, …])

Cluster cells into subgroups [Peixoto14].

inference.nested_model_multi(adatas[, …])

Cluster cells into subgroups using multiple modalities.

inference.planted_model(adata[, n_sweep, …])

Cluster cells into subgroups [Peixoto14].

inference.flat_model(adata[, n_sweep, beta, …])

Cluster cells into subgroups [Peixoto14].

inference.leiden(adata[, resolution, …])

Cluster cells into subgroups [Traag18].

plotting.alluvial(adata[, level_start, …])

Generate an alluvial plot for NSBM hierarchy

plotting.draw_tree(adata[, level, color, …])

Plots NSBM hierarchy using graph-tool capabilities

tools.cell_similarity(adata[, key_added, …])

Calculate cell similarity score based on the kNN graph.

tools.cell_stability(adata[, block_key, …])

Calculate cell stability given cell affinity.

tools.cluster_consistency(adata[, groups, …])

Calculate cluster consistency at a given level

tools.select_affinity(adata[, level, …])

Selects cells based on the affinity values at a specified level.

tools.calculate_affinity(adata[, level, …])

Calculate cell affinity given a partition scheme.

tools.draw_graph(adata[, layout, use_tree, …])

Extends scanpy.tools.draw_graph function using some layouts available in graph-tool library.

tools.get_cell_back_p(state[, level])

Returns the matrix of proabilities of moving a cell back to its group from a different block

tools.get_cell_loglikelihood(state[, level, …])

Returns the matrix of log-likelihood differences when moving a cell into a different block

input_output.write(adata[, prefix, key, …])

Save anndata object when a NestedBlockState has been retained during inference.

input_output.read([prefix, key, h5ad_fname, …])

Read anndata object when a NestedBlockState has been saved separately.
